page.title: 06Leisure Time-Questionnaire
page.content: We sent home a questionnaire to the parents of class 4 to class 7 to find out what they do in their spare time.We found out the most common pastime was watching TV.Knitting , gardening and reading are also very common.The favourite pastime was gardening. 25% of those questioned went to {King's Cinema}during the year.50% went more than 3 times a year and 25% went 2 or 3 times a year. Almost 90% didn't use{Damacre {Community Centre}because most of them didn't have time.most of the 10% left that go,go nearly every 2 months and some go more oten.Damacre Centre is used for Table Tennis, Badminton, Gymnastics and also for Toddler Groups.
